DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare functional status quality life group patient chronic venous insufficiency treat manual lymphatic drainage group treat manual lymphatic drainage . Investigators hypothesize manual lymphatic drainage improve : - quality life , - functional status , - calf muscle strength , - ankle range motion , - edema , - severity disease , - symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Lymphatic Drainage Chronic Venous Insufficiency : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Diagnose chronic venous insufficiency class C35 ClinicalEtiologicalAnatomicalPathological classification ( CEAP ) . Severe cardiac insufficiency , Acute venous arterial obstruction , Arterial insufficiency , renal insufficiency , Uncompensated thyroid dysfunction , Pregnancy , neoplastic pathology , Systemic limb infection , Recent musculoskeletal injury lower limb , Peripheral neuropathy low limb .
